alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Western Clay; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 4:44PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Bradford, northeastern Alachua, northwestern Putnam and southwestern Clay Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 444 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Keystone Heights, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Keystone Heights, Lake Geneva, Waldo and Hampton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Western Clay; Western Putnam
